scripts.build: npm run build:simple-hero && npm run build:full-hero && npm run build:cta && npm run build:two-column && npm run build:two-column-text && npm run build:video-two-column && npm run build:find-doctor && npm run build:latest-articles && npm run build:popular-practices && npm run build:two-column-slider && npm run build:info-cards && npm run build:symptoms-ai && npm run build:page-title-hero && npm run copy-block-json
scripts.copy-block-json: cp blocks/simple-hero/block.json blocks/simple-hero/build/ && cp blocks/full-hero/block.json blocks/full-hero/build/ && cp blocks/cta/block.json blocks/cta/build/ && cp blocks/two-column/block.json blocks/two-column/build/ && cp blocks/two-column-text/block.json blocks/two-column-text/build/ && cp blocks/video-two-column/block.json blocks/video-two-column/build/ && cp blocks/find-doctor/block.json blocks/find-doctor/build/ && cp blocks/latest-articles/block.json blocks/latest-articles/build/ && cp blocks/popular-practices/block.json blocks/popular-practices/build/ && cp blocks/two-column-slider/block.json blocks/two-column-slider/build/ && cp blocks/info-cards/block.json blocks/info-cards/build/ && cp blocks/symptoms-ai/block.json blocks/symptoms-ai/build/ && cp blocks/page-title-hero/block.json blocks/page-title-hero/build/ && npm run copy-render-files
scripts.copy-render-files: cp blocks/info-cards/render.php blocks/info-cards/build/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp blocks/page-title-hero/render.php blocks/page-title-hero/build/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp blocks/symptoms-ai/render.php blocks/symptoms-ai/build/ 2>/dev/null || true
